name: Pollo a la cerveza
instructions: - To make the chicken more tender, add salt and leave in the fridge overnight.
- Brown the chicken with a bit of oil, set aside.
- Add the rest of the oil, cook the onion until transparent, then add carrots, pepper, garlic, pinch of salt leave for 10 min.
- Add the chicken back inside together with the beer, a pinch of thyme, rosemary, bay leaf and pepper.
- On a pan cook on medium 1 tbsp of flour, mixing until it changes color, then merge into the pot.
- Cook on a simmer for about 0.5-1h, until it reduces well. Correct for salt.

culinary: The beer can impart a tangy flavour, which usually mellows quite a lot on the second day. Depends on the beer type and how much you reduce it.
